translation: Tbạhy chhe ts prth kạnshi shkhṣh sndi bapt yus (butihs pytth) lukn ṭʿnh (dinuk) th (ptụ̄ ptụ̄) burạyiyih krnuk ʿạdy chuh.
Yymụ̄ mal jmʿ kvr th suh thvvun gnzrụ̄ gnzrụ̄.

Suh chuh smjhan zi tmụ̄ sund mal rvzi hmyshhi tmụ̄ se nishhi (dvyum mʿny hykhi yithi ạsith zi suh chuh smjhan zi tmụ̄ sund mal bkhshhi amis ḥyati javidan (so zndgy yosh nh khtm gczihh) th amis chuhnh yih khyal thi yivan zi akhi doh chuh amis yih svrue kynhh trạvith khạly atahv dunya mnz nyrun)
Hrgz nh, suh shkhṣ yiyhi chkna chvur krn vajnhi jayih andr chhknh.
Th tvhụ̄ kya zạniv zi kya chhe so chkna chvur krn vajynụ̄ jae?
Allah tʿālyā sund nar, khvub grmavnh āmut.
Suh yiyhi timn pytth trạvith (tthan dith) bnd krnh.

(aath ḥalts mnz zi tim āsn) tahdyn tahdyn thmn mnz (hynh āmtụ̄). (aamikụ̄ hykn kynhh mʿny ạsith, akh yih zi jhnmkụ̄ drvazh bnd krith yin timn pytth thdụ̄ thdụ̄ tahm tthaknh. Dvyum mṭlb chuhs yih zi yim mujrm āsn tahdyn tahdyn tahmn gnddith. Tryym yih zi aamhi narkụ̄ lmbk āsn thmn hnzi shklhi mnz vothan).
